QuestData.Title: Monstrosity
QuestData.Description: It's plain to see that this statue and the surrounding ruins are of ancient origin. Clearly, this land has a deep history, which means it could not have been born of the cataclysm.$b$bAnd yet these waters have been explored for ages now, with no record of anything here but open sea.$b$bPerhaps if you were to sketch the pieces of this broken statue, you might shed light on the continent's origins.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect sketches of each piece of the ancient statue.
